caption.center: JUD KURLANCHEEK, APPELLANT, v. LINDA KURLANCHEEK, APPELLEE.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District.

opinion.posture: An Appeal from the Circuit Court for Dade County; Richard Yale Feder, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Buchbinder Elegant, Miami, and Carolina A. Echarte, Coral Gables, for Appellant.
Andrew M. Leinoff, Coral Gables, for Appellee.
opinion.panel: Before SCHWARTZ, C.J., and NESBITT and FERGUSON, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Affirmed. Canakaris v. Canakaris, 382 So.2d 1197 (Fla. 1980);Nisbeth v. Nisbeth, 568 So.2d 461 (Fla. 3d DCA 1990).Page 179
